Both [[Naruto]] and [[Sasuke]] use the [[chakra]] of the nine [[tailed beast]]s to enhance their power; with the former manifesting his three-headed, six-armed [[Jinchūriki Forms|Tailed Beast Mode]] while forming the [[Six Paths: Ultra-Big Ball Rasenshuriken]], and the latter manifesting his enhanced [[Susanoo|Complete Body — Susanoo]] while forming [[Indra's Arrow]]. They fire off their techniques simultaneously at the target, resulting in a cataclysmic explosion.

== Trivia ==
* The explosion of this technique is identical to the clash of the same two techniques from Naruto and Sasuke's final battle in [[Naruto and Sasuke 4|chapter 697]].
